tasks.description: Publish Pinterest's existing content standards within Gestalt's documentation.
Add Gestalt's working collaboration model to its documentation as a reference point for cross-functional collaboration.
Release general guidelines and principles for navigation content and display.
Creation of a Card component to support emerging Pinner needs.
Provide functional and experiential enhancements to the SideNavigation component to be more compatible with product needs.
Creation of a Tile component to support emerging M10n needs.
Development of a DateRange component to cover input of start/end dates.

tasks.task: Figma tooling to support design workflow
tasks.description: Ship Figma plugin functionality to enhance designers' day-to-day workflow.
Development of usage guidelines and best practices for form creation within Gestalt.
Creation of a feedback tool within the docs site to enable more fluid user feedback.
Development of usage guidelines and best practices for utilizing illustrations with Gestalt.
Development of the Icon component for Android and iOS along with respective documentation.
Development of the Toast component for Android along with respective documentation.
Development of a mobile-specific treatment of the IconButton component along with respective documentation.

tasks.task: Cross platform Gestalt engineering adoption metric
tasks.description: Define and implement a cross platform measurement for Gestalt engineering adoption on the Web platform.
Increase safety of future Masonry work by establishing a baseline of integration tests.
Initial experimental attempt to support items spanning two column widths in Masonry.
Development of a mobile web treatment for the Popover component along with respective documentation.
Development of a mobile web treatment for the Dropdown component along with respective documentation.
Development of a mobile web treatment for the Modal component along with respective documentation.
Development of a mobile web Sheet component along with respective documentation.
Implement all default labels supported in components for faster development and message consistency.
